nodes.text: Barnahof was an astronomical object in the Outer Rim Territories, patrolled by stormtroopers of the Galactic Empire. While transporting the Rebel Alliance members Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker and Han Solo, Sana Starros stopped on Barnahof to meet with the Nuxan informant Bodo Linx.

Shortly after the assault on the Mako-Ta Space Docks, Sana Starros took Leia Organa, Luke Skywalker and Han Solo to a cantina on Barnahof so that they could meet with the Nuxan informant Bodo Linx. Several stormtroopers entered the establishment, and the rebels hid beneath a table. The stormtroopers briefly interrogated Starros and Linx before leaving, allowing the rebel fugitives to continue making their deal. Linx gave Organa a datacard containing the details of a contact on Brentaal IV, and Starros left Barnahof, transporting the rebels in the Volt Cobra.
Barnahof first appeared in the 2018 canon comic Star Wars 56, written by Kieron Gillen and illustrated by Andrea Broccardo.
